mapper.select: select cpuusage, memusage,diskusage, nwusage from Serverusage, UserServer where UserServer.id = #{id} and UserServer.ip = Serverusage.ip order by Serverusage.date desc limit 1
select corename, coreusage from coredata, UserServer where UserServer.id=#{id} and coredata.ip=UserServer.ip and coredata.corename REGEXP '^[[:digit:]]+$' order by date desc limit 4
